DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the RetCam (Clarity Medical Systems, Pleasanton, CA) to a new prototype pediatric imaging system, COSMOS, produced by Phoenix Clinical Incorporated (PCI) (Pleasanton, CA).
DOC.brief_title: PCI Imaging System in Pediatric Ophthalmology
DOC.criteria: Any patient who has a cloudy cornea. Any patient whose RetCam imaging exam easily produces blanching of the optic nerve in the normal course of imaging. Any patient who has consented to the procedure, but whose course of examination has filled the time allotted, leaving no time to evaluate the COSMOS. Current patients undergoing clinically indicated EUA and RetCam imaging for surveillance and treatment of ophthalmic conditions at The Hospital for Sick Children.
